h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Mother of Stones
content: While he technically has a boss health bar and everything, he’s kind of a pushover, barely having much more health than a regular Pinstone, and only doing their regular attacks anyway. Simply Immobilize him, rack up some Focus Points, and deliver a charged strike to send him packing.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Squall Hideout' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Mother of Stones'.
The content is as follows:
While he technically has a boss health bar and everything, he’s kind of a pushover, barely having much more health than a regular Pinstone, and only doing their regular attacks anyway. Simply Immobilize him, rack up some Focus Points, and deliver a charged strike to send him packing.
